    Shipping Methods for Buyers In USA:

      FLAT RATE $25 FOR ORDER $200-400. FLAT RATE $35 FOR ORDERS $400-1000. ORDERS ABOVE $1000 FLAT RATE OF $35 PER $1000.
    • FLAT RATE (Special price)
      LIMITED TIME DEAL: FLAT RATE $15 FOR ORDER $200-400. FLAT RATE $20 FOR ORDERS $400-1000. ORDERS ABOVE $1000 FLAT RATE OF $20 PER $1000.
    • Priority Mail
      30% OFF SHIPPING FOR ORDERS ABOVE $300. Orders below 1 pound are shipped with USPS first class mail. Most orders ship with USPS Priority mail. Large boxes and multi-box orders may ship with UPS.
    Shipping Methods for Buyers Outside of USA:
    • INVOICE -New Priority Shipping
      Orders below 1 pound are shipped with USPS first class mail. Most orders ship with USPS Priority mail. Large boxes and multi-box orders may ship with UPS.
    • International Shipping
      By weight. Shipping discounts: up to $5.00 off an order of $50.00 or more, up to $15.00 off an order of $200.00 or more, and up to $50.00 off an order of $600.00 or more.
    • UPS INTERNATIONAL 2-5 day (2)
      $55 SHIPPING CREDIT FOR ALL ORDERS ABOVE $400. $30 SHIPPING CREDIT FOR ORDERS ABOVE $200. UPS PRIORITY RATES. Very fast, cheaper and more secure than postal service. Phone number required.

      USPS Priority Large box flat rate shipping. Delivery is 1-3 Business Days. Includes USPS Tracking and up to $50 of insurance.
    • USPS Priority Mail Medium Box Flat (retail)
      USPS Priority medium box flat rate shipping. Delivery is 1-3 Business Days. Includes USPS Tracking and up to $50 of insurance.
    • USPS Priority Mail Small Box Flat (retail)
      USPS Priority small box flat rate shipping. Delivery is 1-3 Business Days. Includes USPS Tracking and up to $50 of insurance.
    Shipping Methods for Buyers Outside of USA:
    • International Package Shipping
      Shipping is based on weight and size including packing material. Prices include $1 materials/packing/customs form costs. Pricing starts at $15.85 for Canada, $16.35 for Mexico and $16.85 for most of Europe. For best price estimate, submit a quote request. Weight limit is 4 lbs (64 oz) or 1800 grams.

      Shipping Methods
        Shipping Methods for Buyers In USA:
        • Please keep the order open for now
          For buyers who wish to continue shopping later, but want to save what they've gotten. I will remind you from time to time about finishing your order unless you contact me with a conclusion time. 5 day limit without additions or paid invoice.
        • In-Person Pickup
          Arrange to meet at [b]Legoland California[/b] (limited availability)
        • Let seller pick the best method WITH TRACKING
          Select this if you don't care how it goes, as long as it's cheap but not too slow [b][COLOR=FF0000]and includes tracking for FREE[/color][/b]
        • Standard 1st Class/Priority US Mail (w/Tracking)
          No insurance: buyer accepts responsibility for lost/damaged items. [COLOR=FF0000]Check the insurance box if you want insurance[/COLOR]. For orders over 13 ounces will go Priority Mail or UPS or FedEx Ground (whichever is least expensive)
        • Priority Mail (regardless of weight)
          For smaller orders (under 13 ounces) that you want in a hurry.
        • Ground Courier service
          [b][COLOR=8B4513] UPS[/color] or [COLOR=551A8B]Fed[/COLOR][COLOR=006400]Ex[/COLOR]. Includes tracking and $100 of insurance (Additional insurance is available)[/b] I'll pick the least-expensive one unless you have a prefrence
        • Express Courier service / Express Mail
          [B][COLOR=8B4513] UPS[/color], [COLOR=551A8B]Fed[/COLOR][COLOR=FF4500]Ex[/COLOR], or USPS Express mail[/b]. Includes tracking and $100 of insurance. I'll pick the least-expensive one unless you have a prefrence
        Shipping Methods for Buyers Outside of USA:
        • Please keep the order open for now
          For buyers who wish to continue shopping later, but want to save what they've gotten. I will remind you from time to time about finishing your order unless you contact me with a conclusion time. 5 day limit without additions or paid invoice.
        • In-Person Pickup
          Arrange to meet at [b]Legoland California[/b] (limited availability)
        • [b]Let seller pick the best method[/b]
          Select this if you don't care how it goes, as long as it's cheap but not too slow.
        • USPS First Class Airmail (7-10 days)
          Note: the travel time is NOT guarenteed. Registered may be required for higher-value orders
        • USPS [i]REGISTERED[/i] First Class Airmail
          Slower than typical, but trackable and usually very secure. Additional charge over standard First Class International mail. Can not be insured
        • USPS Priority International (4-7 days)
          Includes tracking and CAN be insured Note: the travel time is NOT guarenteed.
        • USPS Express (2-4 days, Includes tracking)
          Note: the travel time is NOT guarenteed, but is fast. Insurance usually available.
        • FedEx International (Includes tracking)
          Very expensive, but very fast and fully trackable
        • UPS International (Includes tracking)
          Very expensive, but very fast and fully trackable
        • DHL International (Includes tracking)
          For orders shipped to Germany and select European countries, my shipper's discount may make the cost as low as USPS rates. Fast, trackable and insured.

    • Federal Express
      Federal Express at cost. Please specify level of service desired (such as next day, Saturday, hold for pickup and time of day). Please provide phone number.
    • Free or Lowest Cost USPS
      Free (over $50, except sets) or cost plus $1 (less than $50) via: First Class Mail (up to 15.9 oz), Media Mail (some manuals), and Priority Mail or Parcel Select for all others. USPS minimum charge 4 oz. Free tracking.
    • USPS Priority Mail
      USPS Priority Mail with tracking at cost plus $1.00.

      USPS Express Mail at cost plus $1.00. Please specify level of service desired (including next day, Saturday, and even Sunday).

    • Lowest Cost

Shipping Methods
    Shipping Methods for Buyers In USA:
    • USPS / UPS Ground
      For all orders greater than 16 ounces. Standard economy shipping option. Starts at $7.99. All orders include $100.00 of insurance for free. Additional insurance may be added.
    • USPS Ground Advantage Instant Checkout
      Convenient automatic pricing for most orders. All orders include $100 of insurance for FREE. Additional coverage may be purchased. For exact and potentially cheaper shipping, choose one of the other options below. Boxes add 10oz to cart weight.
    • USPS Priority Mail Instant Checkout
      Get it to me FAST! Please note that this will cost more than First Class or Retail Ground. Includes $100.00 USD of insurance for free.
    • V DEBOXING SUPER SAVER (save up to 60%)
      Concerned about shipping costs? By selecting this method we will remove the boxes from any sets you purchase, lowering the weight, size, and cost to ship. Save up to 60% (sometimes more!) on shipping by choosing this method. Ships USPS/UPS Ground with $100.00 USD of insurance for free for most orders over 16 ounces.
    • USPS First-Class Package (up to 16 ounces)
      Packages must weigh under 16 ounces to be eligible for this method. Arrives in 2-7 days from shipment. All orders include $100 of insurance.
    Shipping Methods for Buyers Outside of USA:
    • International Priority Shipping
      We will ship Priority Mail International with tracking and $200.00 of insurance. This method is extremely expensive. To request deboxing, add deboxing to the comments section of you order.
    • International Shipping
      We will find the cheapest international shipping for your order. Starts at $9.99. We are NOT responsible for any possible import duties charged by your country. If you'd like your order deboxed for additional savings, mention deboxing at checkout.

    • USPS Priority Mail Large Box Flat (2025 Holiday Rate)
      includes tracking and delivery in 1-3 business days. Check delivery time estimates on the https://www.usps.com/priority-mail/map/
    • USPS Priority Mail Medium Box Flat (2025 Holiday Rate)
      includes tracking and delivery in 1-3 business days. Check delivery time estimates on the https://www.usps.com/priority-mail/map/
    • USPS Priority Mail Small Box Flat (2025 Holiday Rate)
